telephony_alias_config_contactCenterSolu: Call queue: manage call queue sounds and hold settings
Complete your strategy by personalising the sounds that your customers will hear depending on their place in the {{feature}}
Hold configuration
Announcement before being put on hold
Announcement played before being placed in the queue.
Hold music
Music played when the caller is on hold
Overflow settings
Maximum number of callers on hold
Once the maximum number is reached, the additional caller(s) will hear the overflow announcement, if you have added one
When the maximum number of callers in the queue is reached, the caller will be directed to the voicemail of the selected line or will hear an overflow announcement.
Closure settings
Maximum hold time in call queue
Maximum time before caller exits queue. They will be redirected to the voicemail in your queue or to the closure announcement, depending on your configuration.

When the maximum hold duration in the queue is reached, or when the lines in your call queue are disconnected, the caller will be directed to the voicemail of the selected line or will hear a closure announcement.
